author: Crunchyroll
description:
Episode 1: Scarlet doesn't mess around. Watch May I Ask for One Final Thing? on Crunchyroll! https://got.cr/cc-miafoft

Scarlet has put up with her fiancé’s bullying long enough. Not only is Second Prince Kyle arrogant and crude, but he suddenly called off their engagement during a ball. And if things couldn’t get any worse, he then accuses her of a crime she never committed. Fueled by betrayal, Scarlet unleashes her rage, giving the prince and his nobles a beatdown they’ll never forget.

author: Crunchyroll
description:
Evan Call, the composer of soundtracks for iconic anime series including Violet Evergarden, APPARE-RANMAN!, and Frieren: Beyond Journey’s End, is on The Anime Effect sharing how he creates his emotional and award-winning music for some of our favorite anime.

Welcome to The Anime Effect, the weekly podcast hosted by Crunchyroll's own in-house, resident anime experts – Nicholas Friedman, LeAlec Murray, and Leah President. The show is a lively mixture of roundtable news and discussion with Crunchyroll hosts and special guests as they debate hot topics, provide recommendations, and tackle fan questions. 

Have a question for The Anime Effect? Ask it here: https://got.cr/ae-ask

To bring your brand to life in this podcast, email podcastadsales@sonymusic.com.

Crunchyroll brings you the latest clips, openings, full episodes, and more from your favorite anime!

title: This Frieren Scene Even Made Series Composer Evan Call Cry | The Anime Effect #84

author: Crunchyroll
description:
Episode 1: I was not expecting that! Watch Touring After the Apocalypse on Crunchyroll! https://got.cr/cc-tata

ABOUT TOURING AFTER THE APOCALYPSE
Two young girls, Yoko and Airi, travel through an empty post-apocalyptic world.

They photograph the scenery of famous places all to themselves and camp out in towns full of nature.

The two of them ride and travel on a Serow off-road motorbike together, experiencing a never-before-felt freedom in travel with no traffic and no traffic lights.

With the Serow bike, they embark on a journey around a now-destroyed Japan; a unique story about touring on a bike comes to life as an anime series!

The world's over now, so let’s hop on a bike and go on a journey!

author: Crunchyroll
description:
Episode 7: After poisoning Monica, she literally gets a taste of her own medicine. Watch Secrets of the Silent Witch on Crunchyroll!: https://got.cr/cc-sotsw

Monica Everett, the Silent Witch, is the world's only practitioner of Voiceless Magic, a veritable heroine who single-handedly fended off the Black Dragon of legend. However, the young prodigy is actually… super-duper shy! Yup, turns out she only learned Voiceless Magic to avoid speaking in public. Ignorant of this, the Seven Sages have placed her on a top-secret mission to guard the Second Prince. Can Monica keep it together as she contends with both social interaction and the evils targeting the young royal?

Crunchyroll brings you the latest clips, openings, full episodes, and more from your favorite anime!

author: Crunchyroll
description:
Episode 6: Alicia can pack a punch! Watch I'll Become a Villainess That Will Go Down in History: The More of a Villainess I Become, the More the Prince will Dote on Me on Crunchyroll! https://got.cr/cc-ibavtwgdih 

This young girl hates all those goodie-two-shoes heroines. So when she’s reincarnated as Alicia, the villain in her favorite fantasy dating sim, it’s like a dream come true! There’s just one problem: the more she tries to be evil, the more the prince seems to fall for her. Alicia will have to work much harder if she ever wants to become the world’s greatest villainess.
